files.patch:
@@ -23,1 +23,1 @@
-recent build of JDK 11 or later.
+recent build of JDK 17 or later.

@@ -224,1 +224,1 @@
-    echo "      Path to JDK; must be JDK 11 or higher"
+    echo "      Path to JDK; must be JDK 17 or higher"
@@ -394,2 +394,2 @@
-    if [ "${vnum:-0}" -lt "11" ]; then
-        error "JDK 11 or newer is required to build jtreg"
+    if [ "${vnum:-0}" -lt "17" ]; then
+        error "JDK 17 or newer is required to build jtreg"

@@ -3,1 +3,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1998, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1998, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -147,0 +147,1 @@
+# Note that some bundled test dependencies, like asmtools 8.x, might require newer Java versions, like Java 17, to run.

@@ -61,1 +61,1 @@
-It is recommended that you run jtreg using JDK 11 or later.
+It is recommended that you run jtreg using JDK 17 or later.
